text: Walter Matthau (October 1, 1920â€“July 1, 2000) was an American actor, comedian and film director. He starred with Jack Lemmon in The Odd Couple and its sequel The Odd Couple II. He won the Academy Award for The Fortune Cookie. == movies == *Atomic Attack (1950) (short subject) *The Kentuckian (1955) *The Indian Fighter (1955) *Bigger Than Life (1956) *A Face in the Crowd (1957) *Slaughter on Tenth Avenue (1957) *King Creole (1958) *Voice in the Mirror (1958) *Ride a Crooked Trail (1958) *Onionhead (1958) *Gangster Story (1960) (also director) *Strangers When We Meet (1960) *Lonely are the Brave (1962) *Who's Got the Action?
